name: Chaos on Deponia
description: With this long-expected sequel to the critically highly acclaimed and lavishly praised Deponia, the player enters round two. Chaos on Deponia turns out to be even wackier than its predecessor and instantly puts the player under its spell.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows Vista/7 Processor:2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory:2 GB RAM Graphics:OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX®:9.0c Hard Drive:5 GB HD space Sound:DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows Vista/7/8 Processor:2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory:4 GB RAM Graphics:OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX®:9.0c Hard Drive:5 GB HD space Sound:DirectX compatible
